text:
Optiver | Amsterdam | (Trading) Systems Reliability Engineer | Visa and relocation Sponsored | Onsite

You'll be the custodian of our production trading environment. This includes thousands of servers with highly customised trading software that handle hundred-thousands trades per day, with ultra-low latency. Python and unix/linux required, no prior trading knowledge/experience needed.

Interested? contact janbernhart@optiver.com
